verbose_text: Specifically, with the accumulation of O 3 stress, the decrease in the availability of methane in paddy soil could make high-affinity methanotrophs more active to assimilate atmospheric CH 4 for survival and would increase the sink of atmospheric CH 4.
evidence: methane in paddy soil could make high-affinity methanotrophs more active to assimilate atmospheric CH 4  for survival and would increase the sink
